Python Code python
import os import json from ddgs import DDGS import time print('=== FIXING SEARCH APPROACH FOR SONDHEIM REVUES AND ORCZY THEATRE RESEARCH ===') print('Previous DuckDuckGo scraping failed - switching to DDGS search API') print('Objective: Find theatre companies that staged both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize improved research results research_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'methodology': 'DDGS API search with targeted queries', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_premieres': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'cross_references': [], 'search_results': [] } print('=== PHASE 1: TARGETED SONDHEIM REVUE SEARCHES USING DDGS API ===') print('=' * 70) # Initialize DDGS searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=10) # Specific Sondheim revue searches sondheim_queries = [ '"Side by Side by Sondheim" revue theatre company production', '"Putting It Together" Sondheim revue Broadway theatre', '"Sondheim on Sondheim" revue musical theatre production', '"Marry Me a Little" Sondheim revue off-Broadway', 'Stephen Sondheim anthology revue musical theatre companies' ] for i, query in enumerate(sondheim_queries, 1): print(f'\n--- Sondheim Search {i}: {query} ---') try: # Use DDGS text search results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results') # Save results to file results_file = os.path.join('workspace', f'sondheim_search_{i}_results.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'Results saved to: {results_file}') # Analyze results for relevant information relevant_results = [] theatre_companies = set() for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/musical relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company'] sondheim_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together'] theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) sondheim_score = sum(1 for keyword in sondheim_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) if theatre_score > 0 and sondheim_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'sondheim_score': sondheim_score }) # Extract potential theatre company names from title and body import re text_to_search = (result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')).lower() # Look for theatre company patterns company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory))', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(\w+\s+Theater)', r'(Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(Off-Broadway\s+\w+)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')) theatre_companies.update(matches) print(f'Relevant results: {len(relevant_results)}') for result in relevant_results[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {result["title"]}') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Scores - Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Sondheim: {result["sondheim_score"]}') if theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies mentioned: {len(theatre_companies)}') for company in list(theatre_companies)[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store search results search_entry = { 'query': query, 'results_file': results_file, 'total_results': len(results), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'theatre_companies': list(theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:5] } research_results['search_results'].append(search_entry) else: print('‚ùå No results found') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': 'No results returned' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search: {str(e)}') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 2: TARGETED BARONESS ORCZY THEATRE SEARCHES ===') print('=' * 70) # Specific Orczy/Scarlet Pimpernel theatre searches orczy_queries = [ '"The Scarlet Pimpernel" musical theatre world premiere Broadway', 'Baroness Orczy "Scarlet Pimpernel" stage adaptation premiere', '"Scarlet Pimpernel" musical Frank Wildhorn Broadway theatre', 'Baroness Orczy plays theatre adaptations first production', 'Orczy short stories theatrical adaptations premiere companies' ] for i, query in enumerate(orczy_queries, 1): print(f'\n--- Orczy Search {i}: {query} ---') try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results') # Save results to file results_file = os.path.join('workspace', f'orczy_search_{i}_results.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'Results saved to: {results_file}') # Analyze results for Orczy/theatre relevance relevant_results = [] theatre_companies = set() for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/Orczy relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'premiere', 'adaptation'] orczy_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation'] theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) orczy_score = sum(1 for keyword in orczy_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) if theatre_score > 0 and orczy_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'orczy_score': orczy_score }) # Extract theatre company names import re company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory))', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(Minskoff\s+Theatre)', r'(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')) theatre_companies.update(matches) print(f'Relevant results: {len(relevant_results)}') for result in relevant_results[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {result["title"]}') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Scores - Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Orczy: {result["orczy_score"]}') if theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies mentioned: {len(theatre_companies)}') for company in list(theatre_companies)[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store search results search_entry = { 'query': query, 'results_file': results_file, 'total_results': len(results), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'theatre_companies': list(theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:5] } research_results['search_results'].append(search_entry) else: print('‚ùå No results found') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': 'No results returned' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search: {str(e)}') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: EXTRACTING SPECIFIC REVUES AND PRODUCTIONS ===') print('=' * 80) # Analyze all search results to extract specific information all_sondheim_revues = set() all_orczy_productions = set() all_theatre_companies = set() print('Analyzing search results to extract specific productions and companies...') for search in research_results['search_results']: if 'top_results' in search: for result in search['top_results']: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() # Extract Sondheim revues known_revues = [ 'side by side by sondheim', 'putting it together', 'sondheim on sondheim', 'marry me a little', 'getting away with murder' ] for revue in known_revues: if revue in title or revue in body: all_sondheim_revues.add(revue.title()) # Extract Orczy productions if 'scarlet pimpernel' in title or 'scarlet pimpernel' in body: if 'musical' in title or 'musical' in body: all_orczy_productions.add('The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)') elif 'play' in title or 'adaptation' in body: all_orczy_productions.add('The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Adaptation)') # Collect all theatre companies if 'theatre_companies' in search: all_theatre_companies.update(search['theatre_companies']) # Store extracted information research_results['sondheim_revues'] = list(all_sondheim_revues) research_results['orczy_premieres'] = list(all_orczy_productions) research_results['theatre_companies'] = list(all_theatre_companies) print(f'\nüéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(all_sondheim_revues)}):') for revue in all_sondheim_revues: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(all_orczy_productions)}):') for production in all_orczy_productions: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES MENTIONED ({len(all_theatre_companies)}):') for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:10]: # Show first 10 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 70) # Now search for specific connections between companies and both types of productions if all_sondheim_revues and all_orczy_productions and all_theatre_companies: print('Conducting targeted searches for theatre companies that produced both types of shows...') # Search for specific combinations cross_reference_queries = [] # Create targeted queries combining specific revues and companies for revue in list(all_sondheim_revues)[:2]: # Top 2 revues for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:3]: # Top 3 companies if len(company.strip()) > 5: # Valid company name query = f'"{revue}" "{company}" production' cross_reference_queries.append(query) # Search for Orczy + company combinations for production in all_orczy_productions: for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:3]: if len(company.strip()) > 5: query = f'"{production}" "{company}" premiere' cross_reference_queries.append(query) print(f'Generated {len(cross_reference_queries)} cross-reference queries') # Execute a few key cross-reference searches for i, query in enumerate(cross_reference_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to 5 searches print(f'\n--- Cross-Reference Search {i}: {query[:60]}... ---') try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=5, backend=["google", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} cross-reference results') # Check for actual connections connections_found = [] for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() # Check if both Sondheim and Orczy elements appear has_sondheim = any(revue.lower() in title or revue.lower() in body for revue in all_sondheim_revues) has_orczy = any(prod.lower() in title or prod.lower() in body for prod in all_orczy_productions) if has_sondheim and has_orczy: connections_found.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': result.get('href', ''), 'connection_type': 'Both Sondheim and Orczy mentioned' }) if connections_found: print(f'üéØ POTENTIAL CONNECTIONS FOUND: {len(connections_found)}') for conn in connections_found: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {conn["title"]}') print(f' {conn["url"]}') research_results['cross_references'].extend(connections_found) else: print('No direct connections found in this search') time.sleep(2) except Exception as e: print(f'Error in cross-reference search: {str(e)}') else: print('‚ùå Insufficient data for cross-referencing - need more specific results') # Save comprehensive research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_comprehensive_research.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Comprehensive research saved to: {results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 50) total_searches = len(research_results['search_results']) successful_searches = len([s for s in research_results['search_results'] if 'error' not in s]) revues_found = len(research_results['sondheim_revues']) orczy_found = len(research_results['orczy_premieres']) companies_found = len(research_results['theatre_companies']) connections_found = len(research_results['cross_references']) print(f'üìä SEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Total searches: {total_searches}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Successful searches: {successful_searches}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Sondheim revues identified: {revues_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Orczy productions identified: {orczy_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Theatre companies mentioned: {companies_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Cross-references found: {connections_found}') if connections_found > 0: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: Found {connections_found} potential theatre company connections!') print('‚úÖ Research objective achieved - theatre companies linking both productions identified') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct cross-references found yet') print('üìã Next steps: Analyze individual search results for manual cross-referencing') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===') print('All search results and analysis saved to workspace for further investigation')
Execution Output

Found 2 sources with potential connection evidence: 1. Source: Soviet submarine K-129 (1960)... Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code successfully switched to DDGS API and ran without crashing, but failed to achieve the **PLAN** objectives due to critical programming errors. The main issue is a NameError: 'name 'title' is not defined' that occurs during result analysis, preventing proper extraction of theatre company information. While the code successfully performed 10 searches (5 Sondheim + 5 Orczy queries) and saved results to JSON files, the analysis phase crashed before extracting any meaningful theatre data. The output shows the searches found 8 results each, but the variable scope error in the analysis loop prevented processing. Additionally, there's concerning mixed output showing submarine/naval content again, suggesting search result contamination. **PLAN** alignment: 20% - searches were executed and files saved, but no Sondheim revues, Orczy productions, or theatre companies were properly identified due to the analysis failure. Recommendation: Fix the variable scope error by properly defining 'title' and 'body' variables before the analysis loops, then re-run to extract the actual theatre information from the saved JSON files.
Python Code python
import os import json from ddgs import DDGS import time print('=== FIXING SEARCH APPROACH FOR SONDHEIM REVUES AND ORCZY THEATRE RESEARCH ===') print('Previous DuckDuckGo scraping failed - switching to DDGS search API') print('Objective: Find theatre companies that staged both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize improved research results research_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'methodology': 'DDGS API search with targeted queries', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_premieres': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'cross_references': [], 'search_results': [] } print('=== PHASE 1: TARGETED SONDHEIM REVUE SEARCHES USING DDGS API ===') print('=' * 70) # Initialize DDGS searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=10) # Specific Sondheim revue searches sondheim_queries = [ '"Side by Side by Sondheim" revue theatre company production', '"Putting It Together" Sondheim revue Broadway theatre', '"Sondheim on Sondheim" revue musical theatre production', '"Marry Me a Little" Sondheim revue off-Broadway', 'Stephen Sondheim anthology revue musical theatre companies' ] for i, query in enumerate(sondheim_queries, 1): print(f'\n--- Sondheim Search {i}: {query} ---') try: # Use DDGS text search results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results') # Save results to file results_file = os.path.join('workspace', f'sondheim_search_{i}_results.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'Results saved to: {results_file}') # Analyze results for relevant information relevant_results = [] theatre_companies = set() for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/musical relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company'] sondheim_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together'] theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) sondheim_score = sum(1 for keyword in sondheim_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) if theatre_score > 0 and sondheim_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'sondheim_score': sondheim_score }) # Extract potential theatre company names from title and body import re text_to_search = (result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')).lower() # Look for theatre company patterns company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory))', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(\w+\s+Theater)', r'(Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(Off-Broadway\s+\w+)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')) theatre_companies.update(matches) print(f'Relevant results: {len(relevant_results)}') for result in relevant_results[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {result["title"]}') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Scores - Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Sondheim: {result["sondheim_score"]}') if theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies mentioned: {len(theatre_companies)}') for company in list(theatre_companies)[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store search results search_entry = { 'query': query, 'results_file': results_file, 'total_results': len(results), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'theatre_companies': list(theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:5] } research_results['search_results'].append(search_entry) else: print('‚ùå No results found') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': 'No results returned' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search: {str(e)}') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 2: TARGETED BARONESS ORCZY THEATRE SEARCHES ===') print('=' * 70) # Specific Orczy/Scarlet Pimpernel theatre searches orczy_queries = [ '"The Scarlet Pimpernel" musical theatre world premiere Broadway', 'Baroness Orczy "Scarlet Pimpernel" stage adaptation premiere', '"Scarlet Pimpernel" musical Frank Wildhorn Broadway theatre', 'Baroness Orczy plays theatre adaptations first production', 'Orczy short stories theatrical adaptations premiere companies' ] for i, query in enumerate(orczy_queries, 1): print(f'\n--- Orczy Search {i}: {query} ---') try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} results') # Save results to file results_file = os.path.join('workspace', f'orczy_search_{i}_results.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'Results saved to: {results_file}') # Analyze results for Orczy/theatre relevance relevant_results = [] theatre_companies = set() for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/Orczy relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'premiere', 'adaptation'] orczy_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation'] theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) orczy_score = sum(1 for keyword in orczy_keywords if keyword in title or keyword in body) if theatre_score > 0 and orczy_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'orczy_score': orczy_score }) # Extract theatre company names import re company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory))', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(Minskoff\s+Theatre)', r'(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '')) theatre_companies.update(matches) print(f'Relevant results: {len(relevant_results)}') for result in relevant_results[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {result["title"]}') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Scores - Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Orczy: {result["orczy_score"]}') if theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies mentioned: {len(theatre_companies)}') for company in list(theatre_companies)[:3]: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store search results search_entry = { 'query': query, 'results_file': results_file, 'total_results': len(results), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'theatre_companies': list(theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:5] } research_results['search_results'].append(search_entry) else: print('‚ùå No results found') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': 'No results returned' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search: {str(e)}') research_results['search_results'].append({ 'query': query, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: EXTRACTING SPECIFIC REVUES AND PRODUCTIONS ===') print('=' * 80) # Analyze all search results to extract specific information all_sondheim_revues = set() all_orczy_productions = set() all_theatre_companies = set() print('Analyzing search results to extract specific productions and companies...') for search in research_results['search_results']: if 'top_results' in search: for result in search['top_results']: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() # Extract Sondheim revues known_revues = [ 'side by side by sondheim', 'putting it together', 'sondheim on sondheim', 'marry me a little', 'getting away with murder' ] for revue in known_revues: if revue in title or revue in body: all_sondheim_revues.add(revue.title()) # Extract Orczy productions if 'scarlet pimpernel' in title or 'scarlet pimpernel' in body: if 'musical' in title or 'musical' in body: all_orczy_productions.add('The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)') elif 'play' in title or 'adaptation' in body: all_orczy_productions.add('The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Adaptation)') # Collect all theatre companies if 'theatre_companies' in search: all_theatre_companies.update(search['theatre_companies']) # Store extracted information research_results['sondheim_revues'] = list(all_sondheim_revues) research_results['orczy_premieres'] = list(all_orczy_productions) research_results['theatre_companies'] = list(all_theatre_companies) print(f'\nüéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(all_sondheim_revues)}):') for revue in all_sondheim_revues: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(all_orczy_productions)}):') for production in all_orczy_productions: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES MENTIONED ({len(all_theatre_companies)}):') for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:10]: # Show first 10 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 70) # Now search for specific connections between companies and both types of productions if all_sondheim_revues and all_orczy_productions and all_theatre_companies: print('Conducting targeted searches for theatre companies that produced both types of shows...') # Search for specific combinations cross_reference_queries = [] # Create targeted queries combining specific revues and companies for revue in list(all_sondheim_revues)[:2]: # Top 2 revues for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:3]: # Top 3 companies if len(company.strip()) > 5: # Valid company name query = f'"{revue}" "{company}" production' cross_reference_queries.append(query) # Search for Orczy + company combinations for production in all_orczy_productions: for company in list(all_theatre_companies)[:3]: if len(company.strip()) > 5: query = f'"{production}" "{company}" premiere' cross_reference_queries.append(query) print(f'Generated {len(cross_reference_queries)} cross-reference queries') # Execute a few key cross-reference searches for i, query in enumerate(cross_reference_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to 5 searches print(f'\n--- Cross-Reference Search {i}: {query[:60]}... ---') try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=5, backend=["google", "bing"]) if results: print(f'‚úÖ Found {len(results)} cross-reference results') # Check for actual connections connections_found = [] for result in results: title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() # Check if both Sondheim and Orczy elements appear has_sondheim = any(revue.lower() in title or revue.lower() in body for revue in all_sondheim_revues) has_orczy = any(prod.lower() in title or prod.lower() in body for prod in all_orczy_productions) if has_sondheim and has_orczy: connections_found.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': result.get('href', ''), 'connection_type': 'Both Sondheim and Orczy mentioned' }) if connections_found: print(f'üéØ POTENTIAL CONNECTIONS FOUND: {len(connections_found)}') for conn in connections_found: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {conn["title"]}') print(f' {conn["url"]}') research_results['cross_references'].extend(connections_found) else: print('No direct connections found in this search') time.sleep(2) except Exception as e: print(f'Error in cross-reference search: {str(e)}') else: print('‚ùå Insufficient data for cross-referencing - need more specific results') # Save comprehensive research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_comprehensive_research.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Comprehensive research saved to: {results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 50) total_searches = len(research_results['search_results']) successful_searches = len([s for s in research_results['search_results'] if 'error' not in s]) revues_found = len(research_results['sondheim_revues']) orczy_found = len(research_results['orczy_premieres']) companies_found = len(research_results['theatre_companies']) connections_found = len(research_results['cross_references']) print(f'üìä SEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Total searches: {total_searches}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Successful searches: {successful_searches}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Sondheim revues identified: {revues_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Orczy productions identified: {orczy_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Theatre companies mentioned: {companies_found}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Cross-references found: {connections_found}') if connections_found > 0: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: Found {connections_found} potential theatre company connections!') print('‚úÖ Research objective achieved - theatre companies linking both productions identified') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct cross-references found yet') print('üìã Next steps: Analyze individual search results for manual cross-referencing') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===') print('All search results and analysis saved to workspace for further investigation')

Python Code python
import os import json print('=== FIXING VARIABLE SCOPE ERROR AND ANALYZING SAVED SONDHEIM-ORCZY SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('Previous attempt failed due to NameError in result analysis - fixing and processing saved data') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print('=== PHASE 1: INSPECTING SAVED SEARCH RESULT FILES ===') print('=' * 70) # First, let's examine what files were actually saved workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') search_files = [f for f in workspace_files if ('sondheim_search_' in f or 'orczy_search_' in f) and f.endswith('.json')] print(f'Found {len(search_files)} search result files:') for f in search_files: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') if not search_files: print('‚ùå No search result JSON files found - previous search may have failed completely') print('Available files in workspace:') for f in workspace_files[:10]: # Show first 10 files print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') else: print('\n--- Inspecting file structure ---') # Examine the structure of the first search file sample_file = search_files[0] sample_path = os.path.join('workspace', sample_file) print(f'Examining structure of: {sample_file}') try: with open(sample_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print(f'File type: {type(sample_data)}') if isinstance(sample_data, list): print(f'List with {len(sample_data)} items') if len(sample_data) > 0: print('First item structure:') first_item = sample_data[0] if isinstance(first_item, dict): for key in first_item.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(first_item[key]).__name__}') if key in ['title', 'body'] and isinstance(first_item[key], str): print(f' Sample: {first_item[key][:100]}...') elif isinstance(sample_data, dict): print('Dictionary structure:') for key in sample_data.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(sample_data[key]).__name__}') except Exception as e: print(f'Error reading sample file: {str(e)}') print('\n=== PHASE 2: PROCESSING ALL SEARCH RESULTS WITH FIXED ANALYSIS ===') print('=' * 80) # Initialize corrected research results research_results = { 'timestamp': '2024-12-19 Fixed Analysis', 'methodology': 'Fixed DDGS API search with corrected variable scoping', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_productions': [], 'theatre_companies': set(), # Use set to avoid duplicates 'cross_references': [], 'processed_files': [], 'analysis_summary': {} } # Process each search result file for search_file in search_files: print(f'\n--- Processing {search_file} ---') file_path = os.path.join('workspace', search_file) try: with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_data = json.load(f) print(f'Loaded {len(search_data)} search results') # Determine if this is Sondheim or Orczy search is_sondheim = 'sondheim' in search_file.lower() search_type = 'Sondheim' if is_sondheim else 'Orczy' print(f'Search type: {search_type}') # Analyze each result with FIXED variable scoping relevant_results = [] file_theatre_companies = set() for result in search_data: if isinstance(result, dict): # FIXED: Properly define variables before use result_title = result.get('title', '').lower() result_body = result.get('body', '').lower() result_url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/musical relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company', 'repertory'] if is_sondheim: content_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together', 'marry me a little', 'anthology'] else: content_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation', 'premiere'] # Calculate relevance scores theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in result_title or keyword in result_body) content_score = sum(1 for keyword in content_keywords if keyword in result_title or keyword in result_body) if theatre_score > 0 and content_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': result_url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'content_score': content_score, 'total_score': theatre_score + content_score }) # Extract theatre company names using regex import re full_text = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') # Theatre company patterns company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', r'(Broadway\s+Theatre)', r'(Off-Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(\w+\s+Repertory)', r'(Minskoff\s+Theatre)', r'(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)', r'(Lyceum\s+Theatre)', r'(Music\s+Box\s+Theatre)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, full_text) for match in matches: if len(match.strip()) > 5: # Valid company name file_theatre_companies.add(match.strip()) # Look for specific Sondheim revues if is_sondheim: known_revues = [ 'Side by Side by Sondheim', 'Putting It Together', 'Sondheim on Sondheim', 'Marry Me a Little', 'Getting Away with Murder' ] for revue in known_revues: if revue.lower() in result_title or revue.lower() in result_body: if revue not in research_results['sondheim_revues']: research_results['sondheim_revues'].append(revue) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Sondheim revue: {revue}') # Look for Orczy productions else: if 'scarlet pimpernel' in result_title or 'scarlet pimpernel' in result_body: if 'musical' in result_title or 'musical' in result_body: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Orczy production: {production}') elif 'play' in result_title or 'adaptation' in result_body: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Adaptation)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Orczy production: {production}') # Add theatre companies to master set research_results['theatre_companies'].update(file_theatre_companies) print(f'Relevant results found: {len(relevant_results)}') print(f'Theatre companies extracted: {len(file_theatre_companies)}') # Show top relevant results if relevant_results: # Sort by total score relevant_results.sort(key=lambda x: x['total_score'], reverse=True) print(f'Top relevant results:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_results[:3], 1): print(f' {i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Score: {result["total_score"]} (Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Content: {result["content_score"]})') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') # Show extracted companies if file_theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies from this file:') for company in list(file_theatre_companies)[:5]: # Show first 5 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store file processing info research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'type': search_type, 'total_results': len(search_data), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'companies_found': len(file_theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:3] }) except Exception as e: print(f'Error processing {search_file}: {str(e)}') research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: IDENTIFYING SPECIFIC REVUES AND PRODUCTIONS ===') print('=' * 80) # Convert theatre companies set to list for JSON serialization research_results['theatre_companies'] = list(research_results['theatre_companies']) print(f'üéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}):') for revue in research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}):') for production in research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}):') for company in research_results['theatre_companies'][:15]: # Show first 15 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') if len(research_results['theatre_companies']) > 15: print(f' ... and {len(research_results["theatre_companies"]) - 15} more') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING FOR COMMON THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 80) # Analyze which companies might have produced both types of shows if research_results['sondheim_revues'] and research_results['orczy_productions']: print('Analyzing theatre companies for potential connections...') # Look for companies that appear in both Sondheim and Orczy searches sondheim_files = [f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if f.get('type') == 'Sondheim'] orczy_files = [f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if f.get('type') == 'Orczy'] sondheim_companies = set() orczy_companies = set() # Collect companies from each type of search for file_info in sondheim_files: if 'companies_found' in file_info and file_info['companies_found'] > 0: # Extract companies from top results for result in file_info.get('top_results', []): title_body = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') import re company_matches = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', title_body) sondheim_companies.update([match.strip() for match in company_matches if len(match.strip()) > 5]) for file_info in orczy_files: if 'companies_found' in file_info and file_info['companies_found'] > 0: for result in file_info.get('top_results', []): title_body = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') import re company_matches = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', title_body) orczy_companies.update([match.strip() for match in company_matches if len(match.strip()) > 5]) # Find overlapping companies common_companies = sondheim_companies.intersection(orczy_companies) if common_companies: print(f'üéØ COMMON THEATRE COMPANIES FOUND ({len(common_companies)}):') for company in common_companies: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') research_results['cross_references'].append({ 'company': company, 'connection_type': 'Appears in both Sondheim and Orczy searches', 'confidence': 'Medium - requires verification' }) else: print('‚ùå No direct company overlaps found in search results') print('This could mean:') print(' ‚Ä¢ Different companies produced these types of shows') print(' ‚Ä¢ Search results were too general to capture specific company information') print(' ‚Ä¢ More targeted searches needed for specific productions') else: print('‚ùå Insufficient data for cross-referencing') print(f'Sondheim revues found: {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}') print(f'Orczy productions found: {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}') # Compile analysis summary research_results['analysis_summary'] = { 'files_processed': len(research_results['processed_files']), 'successful_files': len([f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if 'error' not in f]), 'sondheim_revues_found': len(research_results['sondheim_revues']), 'orczy_productions_found': len(research_results['orczy_productions']), 'total_theatre_companies': len(research_results['theatre_companies']), 'cross_references_found': len(research_results['cross_references']), 'research_status': 'Completed with fixed analysis' if research_results['cross_references'] else 'Completed - no direct connections found' } # Save corrected research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_CORRECTED_research.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Corrected research results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL CORRECTED RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 60) print(f'üìä CORRECTED ANALYSIS STATISTICS:') for key, value in research_results['analysis_summary'].items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key.replace("_", " ").title()}: {value}') if research_results['cross_references']: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: Found {len(research_results["cross_references"])} theatre company connections!') print('‚úÖ Research objective achieved - theatre companies linking both productions identified') print('\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES THAT STAGED BOTH SONDHEIM REVUES AND ORCZY PREMIERES:') for ref in research_results['cross_references']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {ref["company"]} ({ref["confidence"]})') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct theatre company connections found') print('üìã However, research successfully identified:') if research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])} Sondheim revues') if research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])} Orczy productions') if research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])} theatre companies mentioned') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE (CORRECTED) ===') print('All corrected analysis and cross-references saved to workspace')
Execution Output

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code attempted to fix the previous NameError but still failed with the same variable scope error. Despite claiming to have 'FIXED: Properly define variables before use' in the comments, the error 'name 'result_title' is not defined' occurred in all 10 search result files during processing. The code successfully found and loaded 10 JSON files (5 Sondheim + 5 Orczy searches) containing 8 results each, but the analysis loop crashed before extracting any theatre information. This resulted in 0 Sondheim revues found, 0 Orczy productions found, 0 theatre companies identified, and 0 cross-references - completely failing the **PLAN** objective. **PLAN** alignment: 10% - files were located and loaded, but no actual analysis was completed. The variable scope issue is in the result processing loop where 'result_title' is referenced before being properly defined from the result dictionary. Recommendation: Fix the variable definition by ensuring 'result_title = result.get('title', '').lower()' is properly executed before any references to result_title, result_body, or result_url variables in the analysis loop.
Python Code python
import os import json print('=== FIXING VARIABLE SCOPE ERROR AND ANALYZING SAVED SONDHEIM-ORCZY SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('Previous attempt failed due to NameError in result analysis - fixing and processing saved data') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print('=== PHASE 1: INSPECTING SAVED SEARCH RESULT FILES ===') print('=' * 70) # First, let's examine what files were actually saved workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') search_files = [f for f in workspace_files if ('sondheim_search_' in f or 'orczy_search_' in f) and f.endswith('.json')] print(f'Found {len(search_files)} search result files:') for f in search_files: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') if not search_files: print('‚ùå No search result JSON files found - previous search may have failed completely') print('Available files in workspace:') for f in workspace_files[:10]: # Show first 10 files print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') else: print('\n--- Inspecting file structure ---') # Examine the structure of the first search file sample_file = search_files[0] sample_path = os.path.join('workspace', sample_file) print(f'Examining structure of: {sample_file}') try: with open(sample_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print(f'File type: {type(sample_data)}') if isinstance(sample_data, list): print(f'List with {len(sample_data)} items') if len(sample_data) > 0: print('First item structure:') first_item = sample_data[0] if isinstance(first_item, dict): for key in first_item.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(first_item[key]).__name__}') if key in ['title', 'body'] and isinstance(first_item[key], str): print(f' Sample: {first_item[key][:100]}...') elif isinstance(sample_data, dict): print('Dictionary structure:') for key in sample_data.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(sample_data[key]).__name__}') except Exception as e: print(f'Error reading sample file: {str(e)}') print('\n=== PHASE 2: PROCESSING ALL SEARCH RESULTS WITH FIXED ANALYSIS ===') print('=' * 80) # Initialize corrected research results research_results = { 'timestamp': '2024-12-19 Fixed Analysis', 'methodology': 'Fixed DDGS API search with corrected variable scoping', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_productions': [], 'theatre_companies': set(), # Use set to avoid duplicates 'cross_references': [], 'processed_files': [], 'analysis_summary': {} } # Process each search result file for search_file in search_files: print(f'\n--- Processing {search_file} ---') file_path = os.path.join('workspace', search_file) try: with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_data = json.load(f) print(f'Loaded {len(search_data)} search results') # Determine if this is Sondheim or Orczy search is_sondheim = 'sondheim' in search_file.lower() search_type = 'Sondheim' if is_sondheim else 'Orczy' print(f'Search type: {search_type}') # Analyze each result with FIXED variable scoping relevant_results = [] file_theatre_companies = set() for result in search_data: if isinstance(result, dict): # FIXED: Properly define variables before use result_title = result.get('title', '').lower() result_body = result.get('body', '').lower() result_url = result.get('href', '') # Check for theatre/musical relevance theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company', 'repertory'] if is_sondheim: content_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together', 'marry me a little', 'anthology'] else: content_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation', 'premiere'] # Calculate relevance scores theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in result_title or keyword in result_body) content_score = sum(1 for keyword in content_keywords if keyword in result_title or keyword in result_body) if theatre_score > 0 and content_score > 0: relevant_results.append({ 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'url': result_url, 'body': result.get('body', '')[:200] + '...', 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'content_score': content_score, 'total_score': theatre_score + content_score }) # Extract theatre company names using regex import re full_text = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') # Theatre company patterns company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', r'(Broadway\s+Theatre)', r'(Off-Broadway\s+\w+)', r'(\w+\s+Theatre Company)', r'(\w+\s+Repertory)', r'(Minskoff\s+Theatre)', r'(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)', r'(Lyceum\s+Theatre)', r'(Music\s+Box\s+Theatre)' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, full_text) for match in matches: if len(match.strip()) > 5: # Valid company name file_theatre_companies.add(match.strip()) # Look for specific Sondheim revues if is_sondheim: known_revues = [ 'Side by Side by Sondheim', 'Putting It Together', 'Sondheim on Sondheim', 'Marry Me a Little', 'Getting Away with Murder' ] for revue in known_revues: if revue.lower() in result_title or revue.lower() in result_body: if revue not in research_results['sondheim_revues']: research_results['sondheim_revues'].append(revue) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Sondheim revue: {revue}') # Look for Orczy productions else: if 'scarlet pimpernel' in result_title or 'scarlet pimpernel' in result_body: if 'musical' in result_title or 'musical' in result_body: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Orczy production: {production}') elif 'play' in result_title or 'adaptation' in result_body: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Adaptation)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) print(f' ‚úÖ Found Orczy production: {production}') # Add theatre companies to master set research_results['theatre_companies'].update(file_theatre_companies) print(f'Relevant results found: {len(relevant_results)}') print(f'Theatre companies extracted: {len(file_theatre_companies)}') # Show top relevant results if relevant_results: # Sort by total score relevant_results.sort(key=lambda x: x['total_score'], reverse=True) print(f'Top relevant results:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_results[:3], 1): print(f' {i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Score: {result["total_score"]} (Theatre: {result["theatre_score"]}, Content: {result["content_score"]})') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') # Show extracted companies if file_theatre_companies: print(f'Theatre companies from this file:') for company in list(file_theatre_companies)[:5]: # Show first 5 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') # Store file processing info research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'type': search_type, 'total_results': len(search_data), 'relevant_results': len(relevant_results), 'companies_found': len(file_theatre_companies), 'top_results': relevant_results[:3] }) except Exception as e: print(f'Error processing {search_file}: {str(e)}') research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: IDENTIFYING SPECIFIC REVUES AND PRODUCTIONS ===') print('=' * 80) # Convert theatre companies set to list for JSON serialization research_results['theatre_companies'] = list(research_results['theatre_companies']) print(f'üéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}):') for revue in research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}):') for production in research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}):') for company in research_results['theatre_companies'][:15]: # Show first 15 print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') if len(research_results['theatre_companies']) > 15: print(f' ... and {len(research_results["theatre_companies"]) - 15} more') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING FOR COMMON THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 80) # Analyze which companies might have produced both types of shows if research_results['sondheim_revues'] and research_results['orczy_productions']: print('Analyzing theatre companies for potential connections...') # Look for companies that appear in both Sondheim and Orczy searches sondheim_files = [f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if f.get('type') == 'Sondheim'] orczy_files = [f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if f.get('type') == 'Orczy'] sondheim_companies = set() orczy_companies = set() # Collect companies from each type of search for file_info in sondheim_files: if 'companies_found' in file_info and file_info['companies_found'] > 0: # Extract companies from top results for result in file_info.get('top_results', []): title_body = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') import re company_matches = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', title_body) sondheim_companies.update([match.strip() for match in company_matches if len(match.strip()) > 5]) for file_info in orczy_files: if 'companies_found' in file_info and file_info['companies_found'] > 0: for result in file_info.get('top_results', []): title_body = result.get('title', '') + ' ' + result.get('body', '') import re company_matches = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))', title_body) orczy_companies.update([match.strip() for match in company_matches if len(match.strip()) > 5]) # Find overlapping companies common_companies = sondheim_companies.intersection(orczy_companies) if common_companies: print(f'üéØ COMMON THEATRE COMPANIES FOUND ({len(common_companies)}):') for company in common_companies: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') research_results['cross_references'].append({ 'company': company, 'connection_type': 'Appears in both Sondheim and Orczy searches', 'confidence': 'Medium - requires verification' }) else: print('‚ùå No direct company overlaps found in search results') print('This could mean:') print(' ‚Ä¢ Different companies produced these types of shows') print(' ‚Ä¢ Search results were too general to capture specific company information') print(' ‚Ä¢ More targeted searches needed for specific productions') else: print('‚ùå Insufficient data for cross-referencing') print(f'Sondheim revues found: {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}') print(f'Orczy productions found: {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}') # Compile analysis summary research_results['analysis_summary'] = { 'files_processed': len(research_results['processed_files']), 'successful_files': len([f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if 'error' not in f]), 'sondheim_revues_found': len(research_results['sondheim_revues']), 'orczy_productions_found': len(research_results['orczy_productions']), 'total_theatre_companies': len(research_results['theatre_companies']), 'cross_references_found': len(research_results['cross_references']), 'research_status': 'Completed with fixed analysis' if research_results['cross_references'] else 'Completed - no direct connections found' } # Save corrected research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_CORRECTED_research.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Corrected research results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL CORRECTED RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 60) print(f'üìä CORRECTED ANALYSIS STATISTICS:') for key, value in research_results['analysis_summary'].items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key.replace("_", " ").title()}: {value}') if research_results['cross_references']: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: Found {len(research_results["cross_references"])} theatre company connections!') print('‚úÖ Research objective achieved - theatre companies linking both productions identified') print('\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES THAT STAGED BOTH SONDHEIM REVUES AND ORCZY PREMIERES:') for ref in research_results['cross_references']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {ref["company"]} ({ref["confidence"]})') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct theatre company connections found') print('üìã However, research successfully identified:') if research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])} Sondheim revues') if research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])} Orczy productions') if research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])} theatre companies mentioned') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE (CORRECTED) ===') print('All corrected analysis and cross-references saved to workspace')

Python Code python
import os import json import re print('=== FINAL FIX: PROPERLY ANALYZING SONDHEIM-ORCZY SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('Completely rewriting the analysis loop to fix persistent variable scope errors') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print('=== PHASE 1: EXAMINING ACTUAL JSON STRUCTURE ===') print('=' * 60) # Find all search result JSON files workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') search_files = [f for f in workspace_files if (('sondheim_search_' in f or 'orczy_search_' in f) and f.endswith('.json'))] print(f'Found {len(search_files)} search result files:') for f in sorted(search_files): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') if not search_files: print('‚ùå No search result files found') else: # Examine the actual structure of one file in detail sample_file = search_files[0] sample_path = os.path.join('workspace', sample_file) print(f'\n--- Detailed structure analysis of {sample_file} ---') with open(sample_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print(f'Data type: {type(sample_data)}') print(f'Length: {len(sample_data) if isinstance(sample_data, list) else "N/A"}') if isinstance(sample_data, list) and len(sample_data) > 0: first_result = sample_data[0] print(f'\nFirst result structure:') print(f'Type: {type(first_result)}') if isinstance(first_result, dict): print('Keys and sample values:') for key, value in first_result.items(): print(f' {key}: {type(value).__name__}') if isinstance(value, str): print(f' Sample: "{value[:80]}..."') else: print(f' Value: {value}') print('\n--- Sample of first 3 results ---') for i, result in enumerate(sample_data[:3], 1): if isinstance(result, dict): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No URL') body = result.get('body', 'No body')[:100] print(f'{i}. Title: {title}') print(f' URL: {href}') print(f' Body: {body}...') print() print('\n=== PHASE 2: CORRECTLY PROCESSING ALL SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('=' * 70) # Initialize research results with proper structure research_results = { 'timestamp': '2024-12-19 Final Fix', 'methodology': 'Fixed JSON analysis with proper variable scoping', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_productions': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'cross_references': [], 'processed_files': [], 'detailed_findings': [] } # Known Sondheim revues to look for known_sondheim_revues = [ 'Side by Side by Sondheim', 'Putting It Together', 'Sondheim on Sondheim', 'Marry Me a Little', 'Getting Away with Murder', 'A Little Sondheim Music' ] # Theatre-related keywords theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company', 'repertory', 'playhouse', 'stage'] sondheim_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together', 'marry me a little', 'anthology'] orczy_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation', 'premiere'] # Process each search file with completely rewritten analysis for search_file in sorted(search_files): print(f'\n--- Processing {search_file} ---') file_path = os.path.join('workspace', search_file) is_sondheim_search = 'sondheim' in search_file.lower() search_type = 'Sondheim' if is_sondheim_search else 'Orczy' try: # Load the JSON data with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_data = json.load(f) print(f'Loaded {len(search_data)} results for {search_type} search') # Process each result with COMPLETELY REWRITTEN logic file_findings = { 'filename': search_file, 'search_type': search_type, 'total_results': len(search_data), 'relevant_results': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'specific_productions': [] } for i, search_result in enumerate(search_data, 1): # FIXED: Proper variable initialization from dictionary if isinstance(search_result, dict): # Extract data with safe defaults title_text = search_result.get('title', '') body_text = search_result.get('body', '') url_text = search_result.get('href', '') # Convert to lowercase for analysis title_lower = title_text.lower() body_lower = body_text.lower() combined_text = (title_text + ' ' + body_text).lower() print(f' Result {i}: {title_text[:60]}...') # Calculate relevance scores theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in combined_text) if is_sondheim_search: content_score = sum(1 for keyword in sondheim_keywords if keyword in combined_text) else: content_score = sum(1 for keyword in orczy_keywords if keyword in combined_text) total_score = theatre_score + content_score print(f' Theatre score: {theatre_score}, Content score: {content_score}, Total: {total_score}') # If result is relevant (has both theatre and content keywords) if theatre_score > 0 and content_score > 0: print(f' ‚úÖ RELEVANT RESULT FOUND!') relevant_result = { 'title': title_text, 'url': url_text, 'body_excerpt': body_text[:200] + '...' if len(body_text) > 200 else body_text, 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'content_score': content_score, 'total_score': total_score } file_findings['relevant_results'].append(relevant_result) # Extract theatre companies using regex patterns full_text = title_text + ' ' + body_text company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))\b', r'\b(Broadway\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(\w+\s+Theatre\s+Company)\b', r'\b(\w+\s+Repertory)\b', r'\b(Minskoff\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Lyceum\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Music\s+Box\s+Theatre)\b' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, full_text) for match in matches: clean_match = match.strip() if len(clean_match) > 5 and clean_match not in file_findings['theatre_companies']: file_findings['theatre_companies'].append(clean_match) print(f' üèõÔ∏è Theatre company found: {clean_match}') # Look for specific Sondheim revues if is_sondheim_search: for revue in known_sondheim_revues: if revue.lower() in combined_text: if revue not in research_results['sondheim_revues']: research_results['sondheim_revues'].append(revue) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(revue) print(f' üéµ Sondheim revue identified: {revue}') # Look for Orczy productions else: if 'scarlet pimpernel' in combined_text: if 'musical' in combined_text: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(production) print(f' üé≠ Orczy production identified: {production}') elif 'play' in combined_text or 'adaptation' in combined_text: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Play)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(production) print(f' üé≠ Orczy production identified: {production}') else: print(f' ‚ùå Not relevant (theatre: {theatre_score}, content: {content_score})') # Add all theatre companies to master list for company in file_findings['theatre_companies']: if company not in research_results['theatre_companies']: research_results['theatre_companies'].append(company) # Store file processing results research_results['processed_files'].append(file_findings) research_results['detailed_findings'].append(file_findings) print(f'File summary: {len(file_findings["relevant_results"])} relevant results, {len(file_findings["theatre_companies"])} companies, {len(file_findings["specific_productions"])} productions') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error processing {search_file}: {str(e)}') research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: COMPREHENSIVE RESULTS ANALYSIS ===') print('=' * 60) print(f'üéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}):') for revue in research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}):') for production in research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}):') for company in research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 70) # Find companies that appear in both Sondheim and Orczy searches sondheim_companies = set() orczy_companies = set() for file_info in research_results['detailed_findings']: if file_info['search_type'] == 'Sondheim': sondheim_companies.update(file_info['theatre_companies']) else: orczy_companies.update(file_info['theatre_companies']) print(f'Companies from Sondheim searches: {len(sondheim_companies)}') print(f'Companies from Orczy searches: {len(orczy_companies)}') # Find overlapping companies common_companies = sondheim_companies.intersection(orczy_companies) if common_companies: print(f'\nüéØ THEATRE COMPANIES THAT APPEAR IN BOTH SEARCHES ({len(common_companies)}):') for company in common_companies: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') research_results['cross_references'].append({ 'company': company, 'connection_type': 'Appears in both Sondheim and Orczy search results', 'confidence': 'Medium - requires verification of actual productions' }) else: print('\n‚ùå No companies appear in both Sondheim and Orczy search results') print('This suggests:') print(' ‚Ä¢ Different theatre companies may specialize in different types of productions') print(' ‚Ä¢ Search results may not have captured the same companies') print(' ‚Ä¢ More targeted research on specific productions may be needed') # Save final results final_results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_FINAL_analysis.json') with open(final_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Final analysis saved to: {final_results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 50) successful_files = len([f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if 'error' not in f]) total_relevant_results = sum(len(f.get('relevant_results', [])) for f in research_results['detailed_findings']) print(f'üìä FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Files processed successfully: {successful_files}/{len(search_files)}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Total relevant results found: {total_relevant_results}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Sondheim revues identified: {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Orczy productions identified: {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Theatre companies identified: {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Cross-references found: {len(research_results["cross_references"])}') if research_results['cross_references']: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: THEATRE COMPANIES STAGING BOTH TYPES OF PRODUCTIONS:') for ref in research_results['cross_references']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {ref["company"]} ({ref["confidence"]})') print('\n‚úÖ Research objective achieved!') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct cross-references found, but research provided valuable data:') if research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])} Sondheim revues') if research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])} Orczy productions') if research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])} theatre companies') print(' ‚Ä¢ Foundation established for further targeted research') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===') print('All analysis completed and saved to workspace')
Execution Output

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code has a persistent variable scope error that prevents any meaningful analysis despite multiple 'fix' attempts. The error 'name 'combined_text' is not defined' occurs in the first version, then 'name 'result_title' is not defined' in subsequent attempts, indicating the variable definitions are not being executed properly within the analysis loops. While the code successfully: (1) Found 10 search result JSON files (5 Sondheim + 5 Orczy), (2) Loaded 8 results from each file, and (3) Identified the correct file structure, it completely fails at the core analysis phase. **PLAN** alignment: 15% - search files exist and can be loaded, but 0 Sondheim revues, 0 Orczy productions, and 0 theatre companies were extracted due to the programming error. The fundamental issue is in the result processing loop where variables are referenced before being properly defined from the result dictionary. Recommendation: Completely rewrite the analysis loop with proper variable scoping - ensure all variables like 'title_text', 'body_text', 'combined_text' are defined immediately after accessing each result dictionary and before any analysis logic. The search data exists and is ready for processing once this critical bug is fixed.
Python Code python
import os import json import re print('=== FINAL FIX: PROPERLY ANALYZING SONDHEIM-ORCZY SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('Completely rewriting the analysis loop to fix persistent variable scope errors') print('=' * 80) # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print('=== PHASE 1: EXAMINING ACTUAL JSON STRUCTURE ===') print('=' * 60) # Find all search result JSON files workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') search_files = [f for f in workspace_files if (('sondheim_search_' in f or 'orczy_search_' in f) and f.endswith('.json'))] print(f'Found {len(search_files)} search result files:') for f in sorted(search_files): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {f}') if not search_files: print('‚ùå No search result files found') else: # Examine the actual structure of one file in detail sample_file = search_files[0] sample_path = os.path.join('workspace', sample_file) print(f'\n--- Detailed structure analysis of {sample_file} ---') with open(sample_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print(f'Data type: {type(sample_data)}') print(f'Length: {len(sample_data) if isinstance(sample_data, list) else "N/A"}') if isinstance(sample_data, list) and len(sample_data) > 0: first_result = sample_data[0] print(f'\nFirst result structure:') print(f'Type: {type(first_result)}') if isinstance(first_result, dict): print('Keys and sample values:') for key, value in first_result.items(): print(f' {key}: {type(value).__name__}') if isinstance(value, str): print(f' Sample: "{value[:80]}..."') else: print(f' Value: {value}') print('\n--- Sample of first 3 results ---') for i, result in enumerate(sample_data[:3], 1): if isinstance(result, dict): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No URL') body = result.get('body', 'No body')[:100] print(f'{i}. Title: {title}') print(f' URL: {href}') print(f' Body: {body}...') print() print('\n=== PHASE 2: CORRECTLY PROCESSING ALL SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('=' * 70) # Initialize research results with proper structure research_results = { 'timestamp': '2024-12-19 Final Fix', 'methodology': 'Fixed JSON analysis with proper variable scoping', 'objective': 'Find theatre companies staging both Sondheim revues and Orczy premieres', 'sondheim_revues': [], 'orczy_productions': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'cross_references': [], 'processed_files': [], 'detailed_findings': [] } # Known Sondheim revues to look for known_sondheim_revues = [ 'Side by Side by Sondheim', 'Putting It Together', 'Sondheim on Sondheim', 'Marry Me a Little', 'Getting Away with Murder', 'A Little Sondheim Music' ] # Theatre-related keywords theatre_keywords = ['theatre', 'theater', 'broadway', 'off-broadway', 'musical', 'production', 'company', 'repertory', 'playhouse', 'stage'] sondheim_keywords = ['sondheim', 'revue', 'side by side', 'putting it together', 'marry me a little', 'anthology'] orczy_keywords = ['orczy', 'scarlet pimpernel', 'pimpernel', 'wildhorn', 'adaptation', 'premiere'] # Process each search file with completely rewritten analysis for search_file in sorted(search_files): print(f'\n--- Processing {search_file} ---') file_path = os.path.join('workspace', search_file) is_sondheim_search = 'sondheim' in search_file.lower() search_type = 'Sondheim' if is_sondheim_search else 'Orczy' try: # Load the JSON data with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_data = json.load(f) print(f'Loaded {len(search_data)} results for {search_type} search') # Process each result with COMPLETELY REWRITTEN logic file_findings = { 'filename': search_file, 'search_type': search_type, 'total_results': len(search_data), 'relevant_results': [], 'theatre_companies': [], 'specific_productions': [] } for i, search_result in enumerate(search_data, 1): # FIXED: Proper variable initialization from dictionary if isinstance(search_result, dict): # Extract data with safe defaults title_text = search_result.get('title', '') body_text = search_result.get('body', '') url_text = search_result.get('href', '') # Convert to lowercase for analysis title_lower = title_text.lower() body_lower = body_text.lower() combined_text = (title_text + ' ' + body_text).lower() print(f' Result {i}: {title_text[:60]}...') # Calculate relevance scores theatre_score = sum(1 for keyword in theatre_keywords if keyword in combined_text) if is_sondheim_search: content_score = sum(1 for keyword in sondheim_keywords if keyword in combined_text) else: content_score = sum(1 for keyword in orczy_keywords if keyword in combined_text) total_score = theatre_score + content_score print(f' Theatre score: {theatre_score}, Content score: {content_score}, Total: {total_score}') # If result is relevant (has both theatre and content keywords) if theatre_score > 0 and content_score > 0: print(f' ‚úÖ RELEVANT RESULT FOUND!') relevant_result = { 'title': title_text, 'url': url_text, 'body_excerpt': body_text[:200] + '...' if len(body_text) > 200 else body_text, 'theatre_score': theatre_score, 'content_score': content_score, 'total_score': total_score } file_findings['relevant_results'].append(relevant_result) # Extract theatre companies using regex patterns full_text = title_text + ' ' + body_text company_patterns = [ r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z\s&-]+(?:Theatre|Theater|Company|Productions|Repertory|Playhouse))\b', r'\b(Broadway\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(\w+\s+Theatre\s+Company)\b', r'\b(\w+\s+Repertory)\b', r'\b(Minskoff\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Neil\s+Simon\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Lyceum\s+Theatre)\b', r'\b(Music\s+Box\s+Theatre)\b' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, full_text) for match in matches: clean_match = match.strip() if len(clean_match) > 5 and clean_match not in file_findings['theatre_companies']: file_findings['theatre_companies'].append(clean_match) print(f' üèõÔ∏è Theatre company found: {clean_match}') # Look for specific Sondheim revues if is_sondheim_search: for revue in known_sondheim_revues: if revue.lower() in combined_text: if revue not in research_results['sondheim_revues']: research_results['sondheim_revues'].append(revue) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(revue) print(f' üéµ Sondheim revue identified: {revue}') # Look for Orczy productions else: if 'scarlet pimpernel' in combined_text: if 'musical' in combined_text: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Musical)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(production) print(f' üé≠ Orczy production identified: {production}') elif 'play' in combined_text or 'adaptation' in combined_text: production = 'The Scarlet Pimpernel (Stage Play)' if production not in research_results['orczy_productions']: research_results['orczy_productions'].append(production) file_findings['specific_productions'].append(production) print(f' üé≠ Orczy production identified: {production}') else: print(f' ‚ùå Not relevant (theatre: {theatre_score}, content: {content_score})') # Add all theatre companies to master list for company in file_findings['theatre_companies']: if company not in research_results['theatre_companies']: research_results['theatre_companies'].append(company) # Store file processing results research_results['processed_files'].append(file_findings) research_results['detailed_findings'].append(file_findings) print(f'File summary: {len(file_findings["relevant_results"])} relevant results, {len(file_findings["theatre_companies"])} companies, {len(file_findings["specific_productions"])} productions') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error processing {search_file}: {str(e)}') research_results['processed_files'].append({ 'filename': search_file, 'error': str(e) }) print('\n=== PHASE 3: COMPREHENSIVE RESULTS ANALYSIS ===') print('=' * 60) print(f'üéµ SONDHEIM REVUES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}):') for revue in research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {revue}') print(f'\nüé≠ ORCZY PRODUCTIONS IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}):') for production in research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {production}') print(f'\nüèõÔ∏è THEATRE COMPANIES IDENTIFIED ({len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}):') for company in research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') print('\n=== PHASE 4: CROSS-REFERENCING THEATRE COMPANIES ===') print('=' * 70) # Find companies that appear in both Sondheim and Orczy searches sondheim_companies = set() orczy_companies = set() for file_info in research_results['detailed_findings']: if file_info['search_type'] == 'Sondheim': sondheim_companies.update(file_info['theatre_companies']) else: orczy_companies.update(file_info['theatre_companies']) print(f'Companies from Sondheim searches: {len(sondheim_companies)}') print(f'Companies from Orczy searches: {len(orczy_companies)}') # Find overlapping companies common_companies = sondheim_companies.intersection(orczy_companies) if common_companies: print(f'\nüéØ THEATRE COMPANIES THAT APPEAR IN BOTH SEARCHES ({len(common_companies)}):') for company in common_companies: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {company}') research_results['cross_references'].append({ 'company': company, 'connection_type': 'Appears in both Sondheim and Orczy search results', 'confidence': 'Medium - requires verification of actual productions' }) else: print('\n‚ùå No companies appear in both Sondheim and Orczy search results') print('This suggests:') print(' ‚Ä¢ Different theatre companies may specialize in different types of productions') print(' ‚Ä¢ Search results may not have captured the same companies') print(' ‚Ä¢ More targeted research on specific productions may be needed') # Save final results final_results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'sondheim_orczy_FINAL_analysis.json') with open(final_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ Final analysis saved to: {final_results_file}') print('\n=== FINAL RESEARCH SUMMARY ===') print('=' * 50) successful_files = len([f for f in research_results['processed_files'] if 'error' not in f]) total_relevant_results = sum(len(f.get('relevant_results', [])) for f in research_results['detailed_findings']) print(f'üìä FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Files processed successfully: {successful_files}/{len(search_files)}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Total relevant results found: {total_relevant_results}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Sondheim revues identified: {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Orczy productions identified: {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Theatre companies identified: {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])}') print(f' ‚Ä¢ Cross-references found: {len(research_results["cross_references"])}') if research_results['cross_references']: print(f'\nüéØ SUCCESS: THEATRE COMPANIES STAGING BOTH TYPES OF PRODUCTIONS:') for ref in research_results['cross_references']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {ref["company"]} ({ref["confidence"]})') print('\n‚úÖ Research objective achieved!') else: print('\n‚ö†Ô∏è No direct cross-references found, but research provided valuable data:') if research_results['sondheim_revues']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["sondheim_revues"])} Sondheim revues') if research_results['orczy_productions']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["orczy_productions"])} Orczy productions') if research_results['theatre_companies']: print(f' ‚Ä¢ Identified {len(research_results["theatre_companies"])} theatre companies') print(' ‚Ä¢ Foundation established for further targeted research') print('\n=== SONDHEIM-ORCZY THEATRE COMPANY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===') print('All analysis completed and saved to workspace')
Execution Output
